MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Arley, Aston by Budworth and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.32AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and network checks and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by MIDDAY. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.41AM on 30th January 2021.
